name: A Price To Pay
description: The story is about a man who is trapped in a loophole for 40 years after being captured by an organization at a young age. He and his friends had joined the organization together but to their surprise there was no way out of it. He ended up being their test subject. While his friends and family are nowhere to be found but he finds the people in the organization familiar. Now he has no memories of his past life. This story is an interactive fiction of what goes on in a confused state of mind. Where you have lost contact of 2 or more of your senses. A mental loophole with a moral. Taking action upon your past mistakes is essential. Whether it be late…
